hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu`aib, from his father, from his grandfather, that :the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) ruled concerning the stream of Mahzur that the water should be retained until it reached the ankles, then released

chapter.ara-name: باب الشُّرْبِ مِنَ الأَوْدِيَةِ وَمِقْدَارِ حَبْسِ الْمَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Irrigation From Rivers And How Much Water May Be Retained
